readable.title: 241345981_1ef4f8109c
readable.content: Oklahoma University 's Sooners football team playing against a rival . Three football players are in action on the field Three football players playing a game while fans watch from the bleachers . two American footballers in red are confronted by an opposition player in purple and white whilst being watched by spectators in a stadium . Two football players attempt to advance the ball against a would be tackler .
